title: 205 - 11 Tips That Will Help You Go Further Faster
description:
Sometimes I wish I could travel back in time and visit myself at the start of my creative career path and give myself some encouragement, insight and tips.

This episode is just that: exactly what I wish I could tell myself at the start of my journey. 11 tips, tricks and tactics for going further faster.

This episode is designed to give you:

  • hope for your creative career that enables maximum energy for your work today
  • comfort for those nagging distractions and doubts
  • ideas and perspectives that unlock creative career breakthroughs
  • JAZZ! JAZZ! AND MORE JAZZZZZ!

This is a Pizza Mystic episode which just means it's intended to give you a bunch of thoughts that you might just need to hear on this very day. Our hope is that it will give you some new breakthroughs, as well as send you through the roof with renewed excitement for your creative practice!

CREDITS

Thanks to Yoni Wolf and the band WHY? for our theme music.

Thanks to Alex Sugg for editing and the podcast!
www.alexsugg.com

SPONSORS

Astropad App - Turn Your iPad into a Graphics Tablet! The episode art was made using Astropad! Use promo code PIZZA for 10% Astropad Studio!
http://astropad.com/?utm_source=Creative%20Pep%20Talk&utm_medium=Podcast&utm_campaign=Creative%20Pep%20Talk

This week’s episode is brought to you by Wix.com
